txt.en: Aelnir can be found in the city of Dol Amroth.\n\nYou should speak with Aelnir.
Roving Threat: Mota, the Umbarrim Scourge
Azruthor's forces venture out of Tarlang's Crown including Mota, who seeks to destroy Western Gondor in Azruthor's name.
Mota can be found somewhere in Western Gondor.\n\nYou should defeat Mota.

'Sorcerers from Umbar hold high rank in Azruthor's forces. It seems that one of their most powerful sorcerers has been sent out to cause destruction in Western Gondor. I fear he may just be a distraction for a much more devious plan. Either way, the Sorcerer Mota should be dealt with.\n\n'I will continue to find out what Azruthor's forces are up to.'

'You look weary after your recent battle. May you rest well knowing the good you have done. The people of Western Gondor owe you much for your effects to halt the Eastward march of Azruthor's forces.\n\n'I have been told that this Umbarrim man, Mota, leads this movement. This surely is a great blow to Azruthor's forces!'
